name: Daunting Footage
description:
Daunting Footage is a short, psychological horror game made in Unity. Experience a video found on the dark web titled "Bodhi_n_friends.mp4" and explore a small, mazey, dark area to try find out what's going on.

Controls:

[WASD] Move

[Hold RMB] Zoom in

Just to add:

I made this game in less than 24 hours and it wasn't intended to be anything big. This is a quick idea I thought of whilst working on a larger project involving the same characters featured in this game, so be sure to stay tuned for that in the future. ;)
